Package com.se.goBears.service

Class RoomService

java.lang.Object
com.se.goBears.service.RoomService
@Service public class RoomService extends Object
This is the service class for Room entity.

      This method checks if a room with given room name already exists.
      Parameters:
      roomName - is the name of the room to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the room does not exist else False.
